code: @Produces @ApplicationScoped @Named("properties") private static PropertiesComponent configuration() {     Properties properties = new Properties().     properties.put("from", "inbound").     properties.put("to", "mock:outbound").     PropertiesComponent component = new PropertiesComponent().     component.setInitialProperties(properties).     return component. }

@Test public void sendMessageToInbound() throws InterruptedException {     outbound.expectedMessageCount(1).     outbound.expectedBodiesReceived("test").     outbound.expectedHeaderReceived("header", "message from file").     inbound.sendBody("test").     assertIsSatisfied(2L, TimeUnit.SECONDS, outbound). }
